name: Create Yr Own Man Super.Hero ~ A Character Costume Dress-Up Game for Boys
name_original: Create Yr Own Man Super.Hero ~ A Character Costume Dress-Up Game for Boys
description:
Ever dream about being a Superhero? Then you must try this game!

Start by giving your hero an identity and then an awesome costume! It doesn't end there because you'll also decide his super powers and abilities for battle! When finished, share with your friends!

====== Features:
+ Hundreds of Hero Combinations!
+ Huge selection of costumes, masks, and more!
+ Hours of Fun!
+ Really Easy to Use!
+ Fun for Kids and Adults!
